room_title: Escape room "The Silver City Bank Heist" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
room_address: 826 Blue Lakes Blvd N Twin Falls, ID 83301
room_description:
A world-renowned historian and professional treasure hunter, Benjamin Franklin Stokes, has discovered the location of the old Silver City Saloon. Legend has it that over a hundred years ago, a local gang pulled off a notorious heist and stashed the treasure here, at their favorite hangout spot.
You've been invited to investigate the saloon and hopefully discover the location of the treasure. But beware! The saloon is in very poor shape and could cave in at any moment. You and your team must work together quickly to both locate the missing gold and get out in an hour or less to avoid becoming yet another piece of the Silver City history.
